value.stringValue: There are no available actions to update this Opportunity. This could be because a Bid Exists or because the Opportunity is already Closed.
No Changes were made to this Opportunity
No option was selected. Please try again.

actionCalls.description: Stop the 'Your Flow Finished' message appearing.
actionCalls.name: Refresh_Page
actionCalls.label: Refresh Page

value.stringValue: Your request for Bid creation has been resubmitted
SCOTSMAN has been generated for completion
A SCOTSMAN was not able to be generated for this Opportunity

assignments.name: Add_Change_Record_Type_to_Quick_Choice
assignments.label: Add Change Record Type to Quick Choice

assignments.name: Add_Close_Option_to_Quick_Choice
assignments.label: Add Close Option to Quick Choice

assignments.name: Add_Link_Contract_Option_to_Quick_Choice
assignments.label: Add Link Contract Option to Quick Choice

value.stringValue: Link the Opportunity to a Contract

assignments.name: Add_Postpone_Option_to_Quick_Choice
assignments.label: Add Postpone Option to Quick Choice

value.stringValue: Put the Opportunity on hold until a later date

assignments.name: Add_Progress_Option_to_Quick_Choice_Bid
assignments.label: Add Progress Option to Quick Choice (With Bid)

value.stringValue: Update the Opportunity and Bid to reflect the latest progress

assignments.name: Add_Progress_Option_to_Quick_Choice_Closed_Won
assignments.label: Add Progress Option to Quick Choice (Closed Won)

value.stringValue: Update the Won Opportunity to T&Cs Signed

assignments.name: Add_Progress_Option_to_Quick_Choice_without_Bid
assignments.label: Add Progress Option to Quick Choice (Without Bid)

value.stringValue: Update the Opportunity to reflect the latest progress

assignments.name: Add_Resubmit_Option_to_Quick_Choice
assignments.label: Add Resubmit Option to Quick Choice

value.stringValue: Resubmit the request to your Manager for a Compliance Review

assignments.name: Add_SCOTSMAN_Option_to_Quick_Choice
assignments.label: Add SCOTSMAN Option to Quick Choice

value.stringValue: Generate a blank SCOTSMAN for this Opportunity

decisions.description: If the Record is Open, does not have a Bid or any Bid Supports and the user has permission for Lite Opportunities allow the Change Record Type option.
decisions.name: Allow_Change_Record_Type_Option
decisions.label: Allow Change Record Type Option?

decisions.description: If the Opp is NOT Type = New Customer and there are no Pending Approval processes and the Opp does not already relate to a Contract and the opp is open then allow it to be linked to a Contract.
decisions.name: Allow_Link_to_Contract_Option_Decision
decisions.label: Allow Link to Contract Option?

decisions.description: Allow Postpone option if the Opp is not Closed.
decisions.name: Allow_Postpone_Option
decisions.label: Allow Postpone Option?

decisions.description: Where Opp is Closed but Sub Stage = 7.1 Written Confirmation allow progress option to update to 7.2 T&Cs Signed.
decisions.name: Allow_Progress_Option_7_1_Written_Confirmation
decisions.label: Allow Progress Option (7.1 Written Confirmation)

decisions.description: If a Bid Exists and the Record is not Closed and Stage != Post Submission and one of the Bid Approvals is not active and Head of Bid is populated then provide the option to progress
decisions.name: Allow_Progress_Option_With_Bid
decisions.label: Allow Progress Option? (With Bid)

decisions.description: If the record is not closed and either a Bid does not exist or Stage = 4. Post Submission then include the option to Progress.
decisions.name: Allow_Progress_Option_Without_Bid_Decision
decisions.label: Allow Progress Option? (Without Bid)

decisions.description: If any of the RFI or RFP Approvals have been recalled or Rejected then allow an option to resubmit the Approval Request.
decisions.name: Allow_Resubmit_Option
decisions.label: Allow Resubmit Option?

rules.name: Yes_Allow_Re_Submit_for_Approval_Option_Outcome
rules.label: Yes - Allow Re-Submit for Approval Option

decisions.description: If the Opp is in the UK/IRE and a SCOTSMAN has not already been generated then allow a SCOTSMAN to be Generated.
decisions.name: Allow_SCOTSMAN_Option
decisions.label: Allow SCOTSMAN Option?

decisions.description: Check that options were added for the Quick Choice component. Otherwise show error toast.
decisions.name: Any_Options_Added
decisions.label: Any Options Added?

decisions.description: Where the Sub Stage is 7.1 Written Confirmation update the Sub Stage to 7.2 T&Cs Signed.
decisions.name: Closed_Won_7_1_Written_Confirmation_Outcome
decisions.label: Closed Won - 7.1 Written Confirmation

decisions.description: Completed RFI Note: Where the Sub Stage = 3.2 and RFI Submitted Date + Outcome have been populated and there is no Bid then the RFI is considered as completed and the Opportunity can be allowed to move to 3.3 Develop Solution.
decisions.name: Progress_Opportunity_Decision
decisions.label: Progress Opportunity?

decisions.description: For Opps that are at 3.2 RFI Submitted without an Outcome where there is NO Bid record (typically APAC Opportunities) allow the RFI Outcome to be recorded.
decisions.name: RFI_Outcome_Decision
decisions.label: RFI Outcome?

decisions.description: Decision + Subflow to allow RFIs to be submitted even where there is no Bid - as would be needed for APAC Opps.
decisions.name: Submit_RFI_Decision
decisions.label: Submit RFI?

Flow.description: Runs as system to allow users who do not have Bid Object read access to launch the flow and use some aspects (albeit none that impact Bid)
Flow.label: Opportunity: Update Opportunity Screen Flow

fields.name: Opp_Approval_Pending_DT
fields.fieldText:
You cannot currently update this Opportunity because the record is locked while the Compliance Review is pending completion


To make any changes please recall the Approval Request and then re-submit or ask your manager to complete the Compliance Review.

fields.name: Opp_BSR_Approval_Pending_DT
fields.fieldText:
You cannot currently update this Opportunity because the record is locked while a Bid Support review takes place.


To make any changes please review the Bid Management Bid Support and then try again.

fields.name: Opp_Bid_No_Bid_Approval_Pending_Message
fields.fieldText:
You cannot currently update this Opportunity because the record is locked while a Bid/No Bid decision is pending.


To make any changes please recall the Bid/No Bid request and then try again.

fields.name: Head_of_Bid_Required_Message
fields.fieldText: To progress the Bid the Head of Bid field must be populated.

value.stringValue: [{"label":"Progress","value":"Progress the Opportunity"},{"label":"Close","value":"Close the Opportunity"},{"label":"Postpone","value":"Postpone the Opportunity until a later date"}]

subflows.name: Opportunity_Confirm_RFI_Outcome_Screen_Flow
subflows.label: Opportunity: Confirm RFI Outcome Screen Flow

subflows.name: Opportunity_Postpone_Opportunity_Screen_Flow_Flow_1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Postpone Opportunity: Screen Flow Flow 1

subflows.name: Opportunity_Progress_Future_Opportunity_Screenflow_Flow_1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Progress Future Opportunity Screenflow Flow 1

subflows.name: Opportunity_Progress_Post_Submission_Screen_Flow_Flow_1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Progress Post Submission: Screen Flow Flow 1
